On this page

libMax Documentation ​

libMax is a framework workspace for building bots on MAX messenger:

  • maxbot-go (v0.2.0) for Go
  • maxbot-js (v0.2.0) for TypeScript/Node.js

Quick Links ​

  • maxbot-go Overview
  • maxbot-js Overview
  • maxbot-js Cookbook
  • Project Roadmap
  • Release Checklist

Repository ​

  • GitHub: Red-proj/learn-repo
  • Framework root: Progs/libMax
